TopicTitle: Please help mewith the demo of KSP

Articles.Content: I have seen lots of videos on Kebal space program and I wanted to download the demo to see if I would like it but once I open it the screen is to high and I cant see a lot of the bottom part of the screen I tried to change the resolution but I have to click something on the bottom of the screen so I cant change it please help.
Assuming you are using Windows, hit ALT-ENTER to go to full screen. Same thing happens to me everytime I start the game.
Or, on the main page you go to settings, graphics, then hit full screen, then apply/ accept.

Or, on the main page you go to settings, graphics, then hit full screen, then apply/ accept.

He said he cannot click in the Apply/Accept buttons because they are offscreen.
right click the taskbar (the bar at the bottom of screen) --> properties --> check auto hide the taskbar --> apply
